item.title: Two master students defended their thesis
item.description:
Congratulations to Cara and Tunde for defending their master’s thesis, co-supervised with Matthew Purver. 

Cara defended her thesis titled “Evaluation of Knowledge Transfer in GuessWhat!? Game”, she systematically evaluated the knowledge transfer from one task to another in GuessWhat!? Game. 

Tunde in his thesis titled “EDA for hate speech classification study” explores which EDA is useful for the hate speech classification in the unbalanced dataset. 

Both did amazing work based in a short time frame, with everything going on.
